author.name: Gareth Field
author.summary: a trail runner, developer, coffee lover, and dog dad based out of beautiful downtown New London, Connecticut!

markdownRemark.excerpt: Good morning! So Iâ€™m trying to wrangle my hard drives here, and I think weâ€™ve got a 500, 250, and 160 here â€¦ the 160 on the other machine is giving me troubleâ€¦
markdownRemark.html:
Good morning!

So Iâ€™m trying to wrangle my hard drives here, and I think weâ€™ve got a 500, 250, and 160 here â€¦ the 160 on the other machine is giving me trouble, and I just found an archive from like â€¦ I donâ€™t even know, actually, letâ€™s see â€¦ 2016 â€¦ and Iâ€™m trying resetting the PRAM etc to get it to see the bootable USB again, that was the problem last time, right? I just would rather have â€¦ well rather see the thing working again and then we can talk about backups. Dangâ€™d booting these things up and seeing the blinking file icon with a question mark inside. Yay itâ€™s going!

Okay, and so while I wait on that and let what to do about this backup from 2016, I might have all of it in Google Drive already, am I going to search file by file? Why is it there?

Why didnâ€™t booting from the USB work, lol ðŸ˜ƒ

Oh, okay, the folder 250dump, thatâ€™s what that means â€¦ so if thatâ€™s backed up already â€¦ oh, and the USB did work, I just needed to run install, classic. Gooooood morning! Another cup of coffee is possibly called for. Iâ€™ve got to slim this drive down though, node_modules, media, all that â€¦ //

Mmm, coffee. Handled some financial stuff, thatâ€™s off my mind now â€¦ oh, wow, good amount of stuff to delete â€¦ fastest node_modules/ hunter in the East, lol â€¦ so I had 180gb used? How low can we go? Ohhh, itâ€™s still going, lol â€¦ took a shower, still going â€¦ weâ€™re at 731,514 deleted â€¦ okay, sweet â€¦ media on its way to being cleaned up â€¦ 159gb already though, thatâ€™s nice â€¦ nooo, being logged into the wrong wifi finally bit me! Thatâ€™s okay, just some time â€¦ oh, yay, go Google Drive uploader go!

âœ¨ 155gb! âœ¨

Wow, sooo much of that was node_modules folders. Crazy. Now letâ€™s try the backup thing â€¦ 21 minutes, cool â€¦ Iâ€™ll clean up some Run Club stuff â€¦ uhoh, are you frozen, Time Machine? Iâ€™ll give it to the top of the hour, lol.

// Ahh, so frustrating! Iâ€™m about to say forget about Time Machine, and Iâ€™m just going to back everything I need to back up on cloud services and be done with it! One more try though, it says 104 seconds â€¦ the smell of my green tea fills my nostrils, the hair on my legs stands up, I straighten my back up ever so slightly â€¦ 38 seconds â€¦ luscious music plays in the background â€¦ 14 seconds â€¦ the tension is in the shoulders â€¦ wrists, neck, preparing backup â€¦ â€¦ what if saving this file while it said preparing backup broke it? What if â€¦ I deleted some stuff I wrote here, itâ€™s hard to get tone right in print, but I was going for a descent into madness type deal. Okay Iâ€™ll give it to 3:30, then Iâ€™m shutting it â€¦ JOY! What a rollercoaster day, lol, and now sadly Iâ€™m falling asleep at my desk and am going to bust a mission here â€¦ ehh, maybe in a minute, I want to keep going.

Ooo, now I know the gist behind git-flow, yay, Iâ€™m going to use source control differently now! Iâ€™ve got the cheatsheet from nvie.com/ in my folder! Thanks @nvie! Oh, wow, actually go follow him, thatâ€™s Vincent Driessen and heâ€™s got a lot of great work!

Okay, now Iâ€™m going to get going, because itâ€™s saying the next automatic backup is in eleven minutes, so hopefully â€¦ know what, no â€˜hopefullyâ€™, auto backup off, Iâ€™m going to go and get beer before they wonâ€™t sell it (blue laws! Whoâ€™d a thunk?!) and weâ€™ll see if the file deletion is done yet when I get back! â€¦ ohh, I knocked the disk â€¦

Supplies requisitioned, dog walked again, food on the stove for dog, and I really thought this Time Machine thing was going to happen but now Iâ€™m really not sure it is. My back hurts, and itâ€™s time to stop myself here. Tomorrowâ€™s Monday! Work-type things are expected to be happening! The proverbial hammer just fell, too, very exciting week! Ask me about it over coffee! For now!:

Best wishes! ~g

P.S. Keeping on going, lol â€¦ must â€¦ get up and running â€¦ lol everythingâ€™s breaking now, this is crazy.

frontmatter.title: Rainbows, Check ... Butterflies, Check ...
frontmatter.description: In which Gareth thinks to himself that if you look up to see whether the stars aligned right then, as the heavenly bodies are in constant motion, you'd only ever see a moment after never really know. Probably close, though. Give it ten thousand years though, eh?
